name: Beat The Coronavirus
description:
A quickly made game that was started out of frustration and ended with something better.
There's only one way to beat the coronavirus. #stayhome
Comment if you beat the coronavirus (no spoilers please)

Made for the Oculus Quest with Unity 2019.3.7f1
Assets used:

  • Epic Music Track
    https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/music/orchestral/epic-music-track-16994
  • FREE Skybox Extended Shader
    https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/vfx/shaders/free-skybox-extended-shader-107400
  • Small Monster / Creature SFX I
    https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/sound-fx/creatures/small-monster-creature-sfx-i-98981
  • VR Hands: Boxing Gloves
    https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/characters/humanoids/vr-hands-boxing-gloves-163817
  • Punch and Fighting Sounds
    https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/sound-fx/foley/punch-and-fighting-sounds-132898
  • Coronavirus (COVID-19) 02 3D model
    https://www.turbosquid.com/FullPreview/Index.cfm/ID/1522792
